remarks: The endpoint does not belong to the half-line.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 3-Mar-2020.)
statement:
ishlg.p $e |- P = ( Base ` G ) $.
ishlg.i $e |- I = ( Itv ` G ) $.
ishlg.k $e |- K = ( c e. P |-> { <. a , b >. | ( ( a e. P /\ b e. P ) /\ ( a =/= c /\ b =/= c /\ ( a e. ( c I b ) \/ b e. ( c I a ) ) ) ) } ) $.
ishlg.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. P ) $.
ishlg.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. P ) $.
ishlg.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. P ) $.
hleqnid $p |- ( ph -> -. A ( K ` A ) B ) $.
$d A a b c $.
$d B a b $.
$d C a b c $.
$d I a b c $.
$d P a b c $.
